captions: I make stuff™ in JavaScript, HTML & CSS.

Graphic design is my passion.

I swear this is bad on purpose.

paragraphs.a: I make stuff™ in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Next.js and React.js. I also localize projects from English to Italian and vice versa.
paragraphs.b: I play the piano and the kazoo, and my music taste is questionable at best as you can see from my Spotify playlist.

stuff.paragraph: Here's some of the stuff™ I've worked on

cards.title: Discord Profile Markdown Badge
cards.caption: An SVG badge that shows your Discord username and presence

cards.title: Neofetch but it's always Arch
cards.caption: This is exactly what it sounds like: this version of Neofetch always returns Arch.

cards.title: Croissant
cards.caption: A website that shows random pictures of croissants. Don't ask me why.

contact.paragraph: Feel free to reach out to me for anything!

easterEggs.discord: Not a link 'cause Discord to this day doesn't support linking to your profile. Very cool.
